title: Workshop report:  Global Greenhouse Information System
content:
A workshop on the potential requirements for a Global Greenhouse Gas Information System was hosted by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory and RAND on Oct. 15-16 2008 at the California Institute of Technology in Pasadena, Calif.  The workshop was the first step in a coordinated, interdisciplinary planning effort with representatives of several government agencies, academia, and non-governmental organizations who contributed perspectives from information users and providers. To download the report from the workshop, click the link below.Download the report (PDF)
Download the report (PDF)
